name: tabBarController(_:animationControllerForTransitionFrom:to:)
desc: Called to allow the delegate to return a UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning delegate object for use during a noninteractive tab bar view controller transition.
declaration:
optional func tabBarController(_ tabBarController: UITabBarController, 
animationControllerForTransitionFrom fromVC: UIViewController, 
                            to toVC: UIViewController) -> UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning?
